attributes.action: make the offence of Assaulting a Police Officer an offence that warrants a substantial prison sentence. Years ago people were really scared of Police men and women, along with their authority. Nowadays they, along with the so called "Plastic Policemen", the PCSO's, are treated as a joke. What has the country become? If my Grand Parents were to come back to life they would be horrified by what has been done to this once beautiful country. We, the Great British people, have been dumped upon, from a great height, God help us!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
